caption.title: Differential expressed genes of RNASeq data.
caption.p: In each tab, “full-3way” indicates full-model analysis, and “full-treatment” indicates main effect of treatment only, upregulated and downregulated indicates comparison of CMV-inoculated and mock-inoculated samples. “Variety-[‘Jessie’, ‘QQ74’, ‘Red Head’]-2way” means individual variety-specific model while considering time and treatment effect, whereas “Variety-[‘Jessie’, ‘QQ74’, ‘Red Head’]-treatment means individual variety-specific model by considering main effect of treatment only. upregulated and downregulated indicates comparison of CMV-inoculated and mock-inoculated samples.
Click here for additional data file.
